name: Abandoned Mansion
description:
A puzzle game where you need to explore an abandoned mansion, the player must help guide this explorer to the light switches while avoiding the traps and even... walls

Controls: 

Movement: Cursor

Credits: 

Music | Post Processings | Small other things : The Captain Moo - https://the-captain-moo.itch.io/

Programming | Level Design : ScriptLine Studios - https://scriptline-studios.itch.io/

This game was made for GeoJam 2021 - https://itch.io/jam/geojam-2021

Theme: Switch
